moves.name: Mirror Coat
moves.description: When hit by a Special Attack, user strikes back with 2x power.

moves.name: Safeguard
moves.description: The user's party is protected from status conditions.

moves.name: Destiny Bond
moves.description: If the user faints, the opponent also faints.

moves.name: Counter
moves.description: When hit by a Physical Attack, user strikes back with 2x power.
